main event: On August 25, 1955, a round, white, stationary object was observed in Plattilion, Nebraska at 0153Z, with no photographs available.
interesting points: The observation was made by a civilian source, adding credibility to the sighting.
The object was described as stationary for approximately one minute, adding to the intriguing nature of the sighting.
The report was classified as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and 'OPN S581 UFOB REPORT,' indicating that it was a documented UFO sighting.
Positional data was missing, contributing to the limited information available for evaluation.
The conclusion section of the report was left blank, leaving the nature of the object unexplained.
